title: alastantiger
author: alastantiger
content: The year 2022, seems to me like the most challenging year for the cryptocurrency market especially Bitcoin. No one could have guessed that the ¬†bear market would persist this long.And for traders, I can't even imagine what they went through. Despite this we are still growing strong and thriving. As you reflect on your trading journey so far as the year comes to an end, what did you do that so significantly enhanced your trading that you wished you could have done it earlier?

Even the institutions got rekt like 3AC, Celcius, etc. But yeah, BTC will make a comeback anyways.Quote from: alastantiger on December 20, 2022, 04:57:21 PMAs you reflect on your trading journey so far as the year comes to an end, what did you do that so significantly enhanced your trading that you wished you could have done it earlier?I learnt that the TA guys are full of nonsense, fundamentals are more important than technicals. And the "funding rates strategy" kept on scamming traders since 60k, (negative = long, positive=short). Now I always follow main twitter accounts like elon musk, CZ, saylor, etc. Their actions on twitter move the markets and liquidates short term traders pretty fast if they just follow TA lol. And avoid trading during FOMC meetings or CPI data announcements.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: It is certainly true that the cryptocurrency market, including Bitcoin, has experienced significant volatility and a bear market this year. However, it is important to keep in mind that the cryptocurrency market is influenced by a variety of factors, including regulatory developments, market sentiment, and the general economic climate, all of which can impact the price. Depending on what type of trader you are, this can be a good thing. For some traders, a bear market can present opportunities to buy crypto at lower prices with the expectation that the prices will eventually recover. In other words, even though most traders would not wish to experience a bear market while they are trading, they can actually still benefit from them.That being said, it is important to prepare yourself for a brand new year in the cryptocurrency world by learning how market trends affect the price of your favorite coins. If you know what you're doing and plan accordingly, even the toughest bear markets can provide opportunities to buy low and sell high.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 20, 2022, 04:57:21 PMwhat did you do that so significantly enhanced your trading that you wished you could have done it earlier?This is just an advice I have heard from successful traders though. But here it is"Trade your plan, not your PnL"I know it is tempting to see the percentage you gain upon executing the trade, however if a trader based his decision on the profit/loss he sees on the screen, then there is a chance you will miss an opportunity or suffer a significant loss. Perhaps try turning off the PnL indicator?

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on December 21, 2022, 09:59:43 AM"Trade your plan, not your PnL"hahaha, that's absolutely true, PNL makes us feel that the trade we made was very successful, even though it's just an indicator that isn't very useful just showing on the screen.The trading plan is more important than that, because every trading step must be considered so as not to get caught in a situation that will be detrimental.The bearish market throughout 2022 is a sign that we are getting closer to a bull market, we really have to prepare for it and hold some assets that do have good potential for the future.Preparing a trading plan is one thing that must be done, apart from that a reserve of money is also very necessary to buy back when the market continues to go to the lowest price.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: I didn't do much other than keep trying to get into buy and sell positions. Even though I often experience mistakes in analyzing, that's okay because I can still get a decent profit in 2022. But I am more focused on collecting more bitcoins especially in the last 4 months, as the price of bitcoin has been dropping to its current low. Not sure if later in the next year, the price will decrease again or even reverse direction to increase. We still have to be patient, waiting for the bear market to finish and be replaced by a bull market.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: There are certain things that I have learnt in trading this year that I was not practicing in the past and they have helped me to save some extra money that would have been lost unnecessarily and they are , I learnt to stop a losing trade where I see I would lose all the money if I allow the trade to continue. I have learnt to use stop loss and I have also learnt to be patient and watch my entry time to come.

I have learnt to use stop loss and I have also learnt to be patient and watch my entry time to come.Those learnings will be used in the future, so whatever we lost before, may possibly be recover in the future.But everyone in this market experienced loss at one point, no one is exempted from such situation.Even expert traders now did have their own share of ups and downs. And that's when you will learn something valuable.As we learned those tips, we are still prone to making mistakes again. As the situation varies from your last, sometimes you will overlook such warning signals.

comments.author: palle11

We don't need to look in the past because if we do that we will be chasing the market to recover and that is dangerous.

comments.body: I guess, what traders are going through in this bear market, is a sign that people will not lack income next year because, many traders has used this season to purchased potential coins that will make their expectations come through before the end of next year. Even though the bear market will occur next year 2023, it will not last like this current price situation that is making people to continue holding until the bull market appear.
